contentrichtext.text: {{About|the leader of [[Aq Qoyunlu]]|the [[Turkey|Turkish]] [[Oilwrestling|oilwrestler]]|Kara Osman (oilwrestler)}} '''Qara Osman''' ({{lang-az|Qara Yuluq Osman Bəy}}, {{lang-tr|Kara Yülük Osman Bey}}) (reigned 1378–1435) was a late 14th and early 15th-century leader of the [[Turkmen people|Turkmen]] [[tribe|tribal]] [[Federalism|federation]] of [[Aq Qoyunlu]] in what is now eastern [[Turkey]], [[Azerbaijan]] and [[Iraq]]. ==Early Beginnings== He was born '''Baha-ud-Din Osman''' and later given the nickname '''Qara Iluk''' or '''Qara Yuluk''' meaning ''The Black Leech''.<ref name=autogenerated1>{{cite book|url=http://books.google.com.pk/books?id=vZI3AAAAIAAJ&pg=PA404&dq=qara+osman&hl=en&sa=X&ei=idchUaW4H4aN4AS8u4H4Dg&ved=0CDEQ6AEwAA#v=onepage&q=qara%20osman&f=false|title=A History of Persian Literature Under Tartar Dominion (A.D, 1265-1502)|author=[[Edward Granville Browne]]|year=2009|publisher=CUP Archive|location=|isbn=|page=|pages=|accessdate=}}</ref> According to [[Byzantine Empire|Byzantine]] and Aq Qoyunlu sources, he was married to a Byzantine princess.<ref>{{citation|title=The Aq-qoyunlu State from the Death of Osman Bey to Uzun Hasan Bey (1435-1456)|first=Ilhan|last= ERDEM|publisher=University of Ankara, Turkey}}</ref> He was afraid of his brothers, Ahmed and Pir Ali's intentions when they joined Qadi Burhand-ud-din of [[Sivas Province|Sivas]]. He eventually killed his opponents and took over their territories in [[1398]] but retreated from [[Erzincan Province|Erzinjan]] on arrival of the [[Ottomans]] under [[Süleyman Çelebi]].<ref name=autogenerated1 /> ==Rise== When [[Timur]] invaded the [[Caucasus]] and eastern [[Anatolia]], the [[Aq Qoyunlu]] sided with him in support and fought alongside the [[Timurids]] against the [[Ottomans]]. Qara Osman for his services was given [[Diyarbakır]] in 1402.<ref>{{cite book|url=http://books.google.com.pk/books?id=stl97FdyRswC&pg=PA31&dq=qara+osman&hl=en&sa=X&ei=idchUaW4H4aN4AS8u4H4Dg&ved=0CGUQ6AEwCQ#v=onepage&q=qara%20osman&f=false|title=Encyclopedia of the Peoples of Africa and the Middle East|author=Facts On File, Incorporated|year=2009|publisher=Infobase Publishing|location=|isbn=9781438126760|page=31|pages=|accessdate=}}</ref> ==War with Kara Koyunlu== {{incomplete|date=February 2013}} {{S-start}} {{Succession box| before = | title = [[Rulers of Aq Qoyunlu|Ruler of the Aq Qoyunlu]] | years =1378-1435 | after = [[Hamza (Aq Qoyunlu)|Hamza]]}} {{S-end}} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Osman, Kara Yuluk | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1435 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Osman, Kara Yuluk}} [[Category:Aq Qoyunlu rulers]] [[Category:14th-century births]] [[Category:1435 deaths]] {{Turkmenistan-bio-stub}} {{Turkey-bio-stub}} {{Azerbaijan-bio-stub}}
